description:
The Most Complete Official Music Album of Beijing 2008 Olympic Games.

This album includes: 
1. All background music of performances and athlete parade in opening ceremony.
( Theme song- You and Me is also in it.)
2. Some local olympic songs (some of them have English version).
4. All background music of the award ceremony.
